charges.charge_description: 21:846, 841(b)(1)(A(ii)II and l8:3551 et seq. NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Judgment Including Sentence under the Sentencing Reform Act Dft pleaded guilty to Count l of the Indictment Any open counts are dismissed It is ordered that the dft shall pay to the U.S. a special assessment of $50.00 which shall be due immediately The dft is hereby committed to the custody of the U.S. Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 48 months The dft is remanded to the custody of the U.S. Marshal Upon release from imprisonment, the dft shall be on supervised release for a term of 5 years Dft shall report in person to the probation office in the district to which the dft is released within 72 hours of release from the custody of the Bureau of Prisons The dft shall pay any fines that remain unpaid at the commencement of the term of supervised release The dft shall not possess a firearm or destructive device (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(A)(ii)(II) and l8 Sec. 2 and 3551 et seq. CONTROLLED SUB-SELL,DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPEN (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Any open counts are dismissed on the motion of the government (2)

charges.charge_description: 21 USC 846-Conspiracy to possess with intent todistribute cocaine. [1:92-m-733]
21:843 Section 843(b), 843(c) and 3551 et seq. NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Judgment including Sentence under the Sentencing reform Act Dft pleaded guilty to Count One of the Superseding Information The underlyintg indictment is dismissed on the motion of the US Dft to pay U.S. special assessment of $50.00 Dft remanded to the custody of the U.S. marshal Upon release from imprisonment, dft shall be on supervised release for a term of one year Dft not to return to this country illegally, if so he will be in violation of his supervised release (1s)
